name: Burnify
description: With Burnify we are innovating the crypto space by bridging the gap between projects and users through a gamified token burning process. Our platform was built on MultiversX and introduces the 'Proof of Burn' concept through BFY(which is exclusively issued via our BurnifyApp upon the burning of other tokens). This innovative approach not only incentivizes participation but also adds a fun, engaging layer to the usually mundane process of token burning. Within just 172 days of operation, our community has already burned over $837,324.50 (it's important to note that this figure is subject to change due to volatility in token prices)in ESDTs(eStandard Digital Token), showcasing the significant traction and impact Burnify has in the market. Burnify stands out by transforming the token economy into an interactive and rewarding experience.
